com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.oplock

Class OperationLockRunner<C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.oplock.OperationLockRunner<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - the lock context type (must implement Serializable)

    public class OperationLockRunner<C extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility methods for executing a Runnable while holding one or more operation locks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable, C context, long timeoutMillis, IOperationLockTarget firstTarget, IOperationLockTarget... restTargets)
      Ensures that the specified locks are acquired for the given context while a Runnable is executing; cleans up acquired locks if the runnable finishes or an exception is thrown from it.
      void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable, C context, long timeoutMillis, java.lang.Iterable<IOperationLockTarget> targets)
      Ensures that the specified locks are acquired for the given context while a Runnable is executing; cleans up acquired locks if the runnable finishes or an exception is thrown from it.
      static <T extends java.io.Serializable>
      OperationLockRunner<T>      		 with(IOperationLockManager<T> manager)
      Creates a new instance with the specified operation lock manager.

    • Method Detail

      • with

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> OperationLockRunner<T> with(IOperationLockManager<T> manager)
        Creates a new instance with the specified operation lock manager.
        Parameters:
        manager - the lock manager to use (may not be null)

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                C context,
                long timeoutMillis,
                IOperationLockTarget firstTarget,
                IOperationLockTarget... restTargets)
         throws OperationLockException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Ensures that the specified locks are acquired for the given context while a Runnable is executing; cleans up acquired locks if the runnable finishes or an exception is thrown from it.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable to call with the locks held (may not be null)
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
        timeoutMillis - the maximum allowed time in milliseconds in which this call may block (must be #NO_TIMEOUT, zero or positive)
        firstTarget - the first (or only) target to hold while running (may not be null)
        restTargets - subsequent targets to hold while running (may not be null; individual elements may not be null)
        Throws:
        OperationLockException - when one or more locks for the given targets could not be acquired or released for some reason
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if waiting for the requested locks to be acquired is interrupted
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the specified runnable throws an exception

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                C context,
                long timeoutMillis,
                java.lang.Iterable<IOperationLockTarget> targets)
         throws OperationLockException,
                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Ensures that the specified locks are acquired for the given context while a Runnable is executing; cleans up acquired locks if the runnable finishes or an exception is thrown from it.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable to call with the locks held (may not be null)
        context - the lock context (may not be null)
        timeoutMillis - the maximum allowed time in milliseconds in which this call may block (must be #NO_TIMEOUT, zero or positive)
        targets - the targets to hold while running (may not be null; can be empty)
        Throws:
        OperationLockException - when one or more locks for the given targets could not be acquired or released for some reason
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if waiting for the requested locks to be acquired is interrupted
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the specified runnable throws an exception
